Information.Name: datatable_v3
Information.Containers: htmlcontainer, dialog, dialog_2, container, tablecell, form, vdomclass

Attribute.Name: style
Attribute.DefaultValue: #%(id)s caption {font: 18px Arial;text-align:left;margin-bottom:15px;}#%(id)s table.table {border-collapse:collapse;border:1px solid #d4d4d4;height:0px;}#%(id)s .th-cell {height:32px !important;background:#f5f5f5;text-align:left;padding-left:10px;border-bottom:2px solid #d4d4d4;}#%(id)s .thead {height:32px !important;background:#f5f5f5;}#%(id)s table.table td.cell {height:32px !important;text-align:left;padding-left:10px;}#%(id)s tr.even {background: #f0f0f0; } #%(id)s .row {cursor:pointer;}#%(id)s .row_selected {background:#effdff !important;}

Language.Sentence: The Datatable v3 type produces an object that represents some data in the datasheet view. The 'Header' attribute defines the names of columns to display, the data are set as an array or dictionary in the 'Data' attribute. This type supports single- and multi-selection of table lines.
Order of rendering the object on the page
Position in visual hierarchy of objects
Spacing between the top edge of the container and the object in pixels
Spacing between the left edge of the container and the object in pixels
Width of the object in pixels
Height of the object in pixels
Title of the object to display
Header of the table, described in the array
Define if the header is shown or not
Table data described in the array or dictionary
Key field which identifies the entry
Define is drag-and-drop is used or not
List (comma separated) of columns, which haven't cellclick.
Use 3 states for checkboxes in multiselect mode
Incorrect value, must be either 0 or 1
Incorrect value, must be even positive integer
Incorrect value, must be even positive integer
Incorrect value, must be even positive integer
Incorrect value, must be even positive integer
Incorrect value, must be even positive integer
Incorrect value, must be array or dictionary
Error, attribute must be in header
Error, attributes must be in header
Fade effect, time is indicated in milliseconds

Libraries.Library:
<script type='text/javascript'>

function vdom_dtv3_triBoxClick(t) {
	$j(t).siblings('em').hide(0);
}
function vdom_dtv3_triClick(t) {
	$j(t).parent().find('em').hide(0);
}
function vdom_dtv3_triReset() { // todo: fix for specific checkboxes
	$j('#trailer').show();
	$j('#chkBox').removeAttr('checked');
}

$j(function(){
	//$j('.datatablev3.multiselect.tristate .tri em').click(function(){ vdom_dtv3_triClick(this); });
	//$j('.datatablev3.multiselect.tristate input:checkbox.ms').live('change click', vdom_dtv3_triBoxClick);
	//$j('#btnReset').click(vdom_dtv3_triReset);
});

</script>

<style type="text/css">

.datatablev3.multiselect.tristate div.tri {
	position: relative;
	height: 20px;
}

.datatablev3.multiselect.tristate div.tri input {
	z-index: 10;  
	display: block;
	position: absolute;
	top: 0;
	left: 0;
	background: transparent;
	opacity: 0.7;
	filter: progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.Alpha(opacity=70);
	-moz-opacity: 0.7;
	-khtml-opacity: 0.7;
}

.datatablev3.multiselect.tristate div.tri em {
	z-index: 1;
	background: #6c6;
	width: 7px;
	height: 8px;
	display: block;
	position: absolute;
	top: 5px;
	left: 7px;
	overflow: hidden;
	padding: 0;
	margin: 0;
}

.lt-ie9 .datatablev3.multiselect.tristate div.tri em {
	left: 6px;
}

.lt-ie8 .datatablev3.multiselect.tristate div.tri em {
	left: 7px;
	top: 7px;
}

</style>

Action.Name: selectAll
selectNone
